attributes.action: insist that the Serbian authorities take immediate action to improve the healthcare system and living conditions in state mental institutions so that they meet the standards required by the European Convention on Human Rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK Government must take action to insist that the Serbian authorities significantly improve all state mental institutions before the European Union resumes negotiations leading towards Serbia's membership of the E.U. The Serbian authorities must ensure that their state institutions do not in any way violate basic human rights as required by the European Convention on Human Rights (ECHR).
